thread.title: BRIEF-Ziopharm Oncology Addresses Rumors And Stock Volatility, Affirms 2018 Guidance

title: BRIEF-Ziopharm Oncology Addresses Rumors And Stock Volatility, Affirms 2018 Guidance
text:
06 PM / in 9 minutes BRIEF-Ziopharm Oncology Addresses Rumors And Stock Volatility, Affirms 2018 Guidance Reuters Staff 
Feb 6 (Reuters) - Ziopharm Oncology Inc: 
* ZIOPHARM ONCOLOGY ADDRESSES RUMORS AND STOCK VOLATILITY, AFFIRMS 2018 GUIDANCE 
* COMPANY REAFFIRMS ITS GUIDANCE FOR ALL ACTIVITIES IN 2018 
* ZIOPHARM HAS HAD NO DISCUSSIONS AND HAS NO PLANS TO UNDERTAKE AN UNDERWRITTEN STOCK OFFERING AT THIS TIME​ 
* AS OF DEC. 31, 2017, CO HAD $70.9 MILLION OF CASH RESOURCES & $34.6 MILLION FROM PRE-PAYMENT FOR PROGRAMS TO BE CONDUCTED BY CO 
* CURRENT RESOURCES WILL BE SUFFICIENT TO FUND ITS CURRENTLY PLANNED OPERATIONS INTO Q4 OF 2018​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
